question: Which two countries signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Defence Cooperation?
explanation: India and Fiji signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) on Defence Cooperation for stepping up defence and security ties including in defence production and military training. Defence minister Arun Jaitley and minister of defence and national security, Republic of Fiji, Ratu Inoke Kubuabola sign an MoU, in New Delhi.
